title: AI-Powered Cardano dApp Discovery Hub
summary: Cardano's rich ecosystem remains underutilized—even community members don't know what tools exist or how to use them, limiting adoption and collaboration.
solution: We'll build an AI-powered discovery hub where users describe their needs and instantly get matched with relevant Cardano dApps, APIs, teams, and documentation.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Zachi diner - Product lead, product Designer, ux/ui designer)

A multidisciplinary creative leader with over 25 years of experience in design, innovation, and AI-driven product development. Supports companies in building digital products, shaping brand strategy, and integrating advanced technologies into their workflows. Leads workshops and lectures worldwide on creativity and artificial intelligence, advises startups and global teams, and brings a strong background in mentoring, design education, and building successful creative ecosystems. Co-founded design studios, guided hundreds of students and entrepreneurs, and continues to merge creativity, strategy, and technology into impactful work.

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/zachi\-diner\-214219/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/zachi-diner-214219/)

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
In the last years Cardano have developed a strong infrastructure and technology tools, time is here to develop business tools that will facilitate onboarding of developers, users and enterprises.

Unique Innovation:

First AI-native discovery layer for Cardano ecosystem, no manual searching required

Context-aware recommendations that understand user intent from natural language or uploaded documents

Real-time integration guidance with working code examples and API documentation

Living ecosystem map that tracks project progress, not just static listings

Compared to existing solutions:

CardanoCube provides a static directory; we offer intelligent, conversational discovery

Other platforms list projects; we connect users to the exact tools they need based on context

We bridge the gap between "knowing a tool exists" and & knowing how to use it"

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Prototype/MVP demonstration

Our MVP will demonstrate:

Core Features:

AI chat interface that processes user queries and project uploads

Smart matching algorithm connecting users to 25+ curated Cardano dApps/tools

Project directory with progress tracking via GitHub integration

Tech Hub with API documentation and integration examples

Opportunities board for collaboration, funding, and team building

Access:

Video walkthrough and documentation

User Journey:

User describes need: "I want to build a DeFi lending platform & AI analyzes intent and suggests: Plutus smart contract templates, DeFi SDKs, active teams

User clicks "Integrate" → receives code snippets, docs, and connection to relevant builders

User tracks similar projects' progress and finds collaboration opportunities

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
On-chain metrics:

Transaction volume increase: Track wallet connections and smart contract interactions from discovered dApps (increase in user engagement with featured projects)

New wallet activations: Users creating wallets to try discovered dApps

Platform metrics:

User adoption: 30+ active users within 4 months after launch

Project listings: 30+ Cardano projects catalogued with progress tracking

AI interactions: 100+ discovery sessions completed

Integration success: 25+ developers successfully integrate recommended tools (measured via feedback forms)

Collaboration matches: 15+ team connections facilitated through Opportunities board

Community impact:

Ecosystem awareness: Survey showing 70%+ of users discovered tools they didn't know existed

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
The Cardano ecosystem suffers from a discovery paradox: hundreds of innovative dApps, tools, and teams exist, but:

External developers can't find the right tools to build on Cardano

Even active community members don't know what solutions are available

Valuable projects like DocuFi3D remain underutilized

Builders duplicate work instead of reusing existing APIs and frameworks

Collaboration opportunities are missed due to fragmentation

Our research shows:

CardanoCube and similar directories exist but require manual browsing

No platform offers intelligent, context-aware recommendations

No solution bridges discovery with actual integration guidance

Progress tracking across ecosystem projects is non-existent

Our Approach

We're building an AI-powered Cardano Ecosystem Hub that transforms how people discover and use Cardano solutions:

Conversational AI Discovery

Users describe their needs in natural language or upload project documents

AI analyzes intent and matches them with relevant dApps, APIs, and teams

Personalized recommendations based on user role (developer, investor, learner)

Integration-First Design

Not just "here's a tool"—we provide working code examples, API docs, and tutorials

One-click access to GitHub repos, documentation, and live demos

Guided integration paths for developers

Living Ecosystem Map

Real-time progress tracking via GitHub commits and milestone updates

Transparency dashboard showing project development stages

Community can follow projects and receive updates

Collaboration Engine

Opportunities board for open roles, bounties, and partnership requests

Team matching based on skills and project needs

Mentorship connections between experienced and new builders

Who Benefits

Developers & Builders:

Find tools  faster than manual searching

Avoid rebuilding existing solutions

Connect with collaborators and mentors

Showcase their projects to the community

Supporters & Investors:

Discover promising projects with transparent progress

Track development milestones in real-time

Make informed funding decisions

Support ecosystem growth strategically

Learners& Contributors:

Explore real-world Cardano applications

Learn through project-based examples

Find opportunities to contribute

Build portfolios through meaningful participation

Why This Matters to Cardano

Accelerates adoption: Reduces friction for new developers entering Cardano

Increases utility: More people using existing dApps = more on-chain activity

Prevents duplication: Developers reuse tools instead of rebuilding

Strengthens community: Facilitates collaboration and knowledge sharing

Improves transparency: Public progress tracking builds trust

Attracts talent: Easier onboarding for developers from other ecosystems

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Value to Cardano

Immediate Impact:

Ecosystem visibility: Showcases Cardano's depth to external developers and investors

User activation: Drives traffic and usage to existing Cardano dApps

Developer efficiency: Saves hundreds of hours in tool discovery and integration

Collaboration catalyst: Connects fragmented teams and projects

Long-term Impact:

Network effects: More users → more projects → more tools → easier building → more users

Talent pipeline: Attracts developers from other ecosystems with clear onboarding

Quality improvement: Transparent progress tracking incentivizes better project execution

Knowledge preservation: Centralizes ecosystem knowledge for future builders

Measurement Plan

Quantitative Metrics:

Monthly active users and AI interaction volume

Number of projects listed and integration docs accessed

On-chain transactions from discovered dApps (tracked via referral parameters)

Developer survey: time saved, tools discovered, integrations completed

Collaboration matches and team formations

Qualitative Metrics:

User testimonials and case studies

Community feedback via Discord/Telegram

Project owner satisfaction with visibility and collaboration opportunities

Ecosystem sentiment analysis

Sharing Outputs

Community Engagement:

Monthly reports on Project Catalyst with metrics and learnings

Open source repository with full codebase and documentation

API access for third-party integrations and data analysis

Video tutorials on using the platform and integrating tools

Town Hall presentations showcasing success stories

Distribution Channels:

Cardano Forum, Reddit, and social media

Integration with Cardano Foundation resources

Partnerships with Cardano developer communities

Presentations at Cardano Summit and regional meetups

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Project Lead [Lead Developer] – Zachi Diner

With over 25 years of hands-on experience in digital product development, Zachi Diner brings a deep understanding of blockchain solutions, UI/UX design, and system integration. As a senior design technologist, he has led diverse initiatives across Web3, enterprise platforms, and decentralized ecosystems. Zachi previously built and delivered complex blockchain applications and continues to play an active role in shaping user-first tools within the Cardano ecosystem. LinkedIn Profile



Proven Track Record and Ecosystem Contributions:



LuxeChain – Product Designer: Successfully led the final milestone delivery for a luxury authentication protocol built on blockchain.



Syngenta Oracle Integration – Product Design Lead: Delivered milestone 4 of a decentralized oracle solution in collaboration with a major global agri-tech firm.



Project Catalyst – Worked directly with the management team on strategic initiatives including:



Ecosystem branding and positioning



Onboarding systems for new community members



Design and delivery of analytics dashboards to support funding transparency and impact tracking



Zachi is recognized for his ability to bridge technical development with human-centered design, ensuring that every project not only functions robustly—but also resonates with real user needs.



[https://www\.linkedin\.com/feed/](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/)



[https://methodic\.design/](https://methodic.design/)

sub_fields.title: Project Milestones
sub_fields.description: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?

sub_fields.title: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?
sub_fields.description: The number of milestones required depends on the amount of funding requested. Please refer to the Guidance card on the right for details

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 1: Foundation & Core Infrastructure

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Research and map Cardano ecosystem, launched apps and services, and current status of developments:

A detailed investigation of the Cardano ecosystem will be conducted, mapping out all active dApps, tools, APIs, and community services while documenting current progress and identifying ecosystem gaps.

User authentication and project submission system:

A fully functioning, secure sign-in and registration system will be built, enabling verified users to create profiles and submit project details, ensuring seamless interaction and project tracking.

User stories:

A structured set of user stories will be written to represent the journey of different user types—developers, researchers, and enthusiasts—interacting with the platform, emphasizing real-world use cases.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
20+ projects manually curated and listed:

A minimum of twenty well-documented and manually verified Cardano projects will be listed on the platform, including descriptions, links, and categories based on utility, innovation, or stage.

Wireframe the main pages:

High-fidelity wireframes will be created for all core platform pages including homepage, project explorer, submission form, and login system—reviewed for UX best practices and accessibility.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Wireframe URL link:

A live, shareable link to the clickable wireframe prototype (hosted on Figma)  will be provided, showcasing the layout, interactions, and initial user interface vision for feedback.

Video walkthrough of features:

A  video tour will demonstrate the wireframes and all implemented features, explaining the logic behind each decision and guiding viewers through the platform’s foundational infrastructure.

sub_fields.description: The month when this milestone will be delivered

sub_fields.description: The cost of this milestone in ADA

sub_fields.title: Progress
sub_fields.description: Current status of the milestone

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: AI Discovery Engine

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Conversational AI chat interface:

Develop a real-time, intuitive AI-powered chat interface allowing users to ask questions, explore projects, and interact naturally with the platform using a responsive, human-like assistant experience.

Natural language processing for user queries:

Integrate advanced NLP capabilities that enable the system to understand user intent, extract relevant data from text, and support multilingual, colloquial, and structured query formats with high accuracy.

Recommendation algorithm matching users to projects/tools:

Implement a smart recommendation engine that uses context, preferences, and user behavior to suggest the most relevant tools, apps, or projects, constantly improving based on feedback and usage patterns.

Document upload and analysis feature:

Allow users to upload project-related documents (PDF, DOCX, etc.), which are then parsed and analyzed using AI to extract metadata, tag content, and link relevant Cardano ecosystem resources or collaborators.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
AI correctly interprets 80%+ of test queries:

In structured testing with a diverse set of queries, the AI system must correctly understand and respond to at least 80% of them, based on predefined success metrics and human validation of accuracy.

Recommendations include at least 2 relevant results per query:

Each valid user query should return at least two relevant, contextual suggestions that link to existing projects, tools, or documentation within the platform, with high topical and functional alignment.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Live AI chat demo with 20+ example interactions:

A functioning demo environment will showcase over 20 different AI conversations covering project discovery, platform guidance, tool matching, and document feedback, screen-recorded for validation.

Technical documentation of AI model:

Comprehensive technical documents will outline model architecture, training data (if applicable), NLP pipeline, recommendation logic, and integration methods used in the deployed AI assistant module.

Video demonstration:

A  video walkthrough will present the chat interface, NLP capabilities, and recommendation results in action, showing real-world use cases, error handling, and performance reliability of the system.

sub_fields.description: The month when this milestone will be delivered

sub_fields.title: Cost
sub_fields.description: The cost of this milestone in ADA

sub_fields.title: Progress
sub_fields.description: Current status of the milestone

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Integration Hub & Tech Sharing

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Suggest guides for top 20 Cardano tools:

Create detailed, beginner-to-advanced usage guides for the top 20 most relevant Cardano tools and services, tailored to different user personas such as developers, researchers, and ecosystem explorers.

One-click access to GitHub repos and demos:

Each featured tool or integration will include direct links to GitHub repositories and live demos when available, allowing users to fork, clone, or explore the codebase instantly with one click from the platform.

Tutorial library with video walkthrough:

Build a searchable and categorized tutorial library with screencast video walkthroughs for common integrations, tools, and developer flows, ensuring accessible learning paths and hands-on demonstrations.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
20+ APIs/SDKs documented with working code examples:

Provide clear technical documentation and working code snippets for over 20 APIs and SDKs in the Cardano ecosystem, including setup instructions, usage samples, and integration workflows tested in live environments.

Video tutorials for 5+ most-requested integrations:

Produce at least five high-quality, narrated video tutorials that walk through the most in-demand developer tasks, such as wallet connection, smart contract deployment, metadata handling, and dApp tooling.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Live Tech Hub with all documentation:

The platform will host a publicly accessible, live Developer Tech Hub where users can explore, search, and interact with all documentation, tutorials, integration examples, and video assets in an organized structure.

Feedback from 10+ testers:

Collect structured feedback from a diverse group of at least ten early users or testers, including developers and community contributors, highlighting usability, clarity, and practical value of the provided materials.

Tutorial video:

A published and shareable video showcasing one complete tutorial from start to finish, demonstrating real use of Cardano tooling, hosted on YouTube or embedded in the Tech Hub as a reference model for others.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Opportunities Board & Community Features

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Opportunities board for jobs, and collaborations:

Develop a dynamic and categorized board where users can discover open roles, bounties, and partnership opportunities posted by projects, companies, or community members supporting growth, hiring, and co-creation.

Team matching algorithm based on skills and needs:

Implement an intelligent matching engine that connects individuals or teams based on their skills, interests, availability, and project needs -designed to foster meaningful, talent-aligned collaborations in the ecosystem.

Announcements:

Include a dedicated announcement section for ecosystem-wide updates, featured calls-to-action, hackathons, funding rounds, or events keeping the community informed and engaged with timely, curated content.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
An admin interface for posting new opportunities (jobs, bounties, partnerships):

Build a secure backend admin dashboard where moderators and verified users can create, edit, and manage opportunity listings categorized by type, role, skill requirements, duration, and compensation type.

Users can filter opportunities by type, skill, and compensation:

Enable powerful search and filtering capabilities on the board so users can sort and explore listings based on job type, technical or soft skills, location (remote/on-site), compensation (paid/volunteer), and time commitment.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Live Opportunities board with listings:

Deploy a publicly accessible board with live opportunity listings populated through real submissions, demonstrating full functionality including browsing, filtering, posting, and applying for opportunities on the platform.

Dashboard showing interest:

Provide a backend analytics dashboard capturing user engagement metrics, such as views, clicks, saved listings, applications, and matches, offering visibility into community demand and platform value generation.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Launch, Optimization & Close-out

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Platform launch on Cardano mainnet:

Deploy the fully functional platform on the Cardano mainnet, making it available for public access with all core features liveready for real user interaction, contribution, and integration within the broader ecosystem.

Introduce the platform to community:

Execute a comprehensive community onboarding campaign across channels like Twitter/X, Discord, Telegram, and town halls, ensuring users understand the platform’s value, capabilities, and how to engage effectively.

Performance optimization and bug fixes:

Conduct multiple stress tests and QA sprints to fine-tune speed, reliability, and responsiveness. Address critical bugs and UX friction points to ensure a smooth, stable, and scalable user experience post-launch.

Project Close-out Report and Video:

Prepare a polished summary report and wrap-up video (5+ minutes) highlighting the development journey, milestones achieved, ecosystem impact, community contributions, and potential directions for continued growth.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
20+ projects listed with progress tracking:

Ensure that over 20 ecosystem projects are live on the platform with ongoing progress logs, stage indicators, and timeline features, allowing users to follow updates and understand each project’s development trajectory.

100 AI discovery sessions completed:

Host and document over 100 successful AI-powered discovery interactions where users received project/tool recommendations, guidance, or onboarding help

measuring system accuracy, satisfaction, and feedback loops.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Live mainnet platform URL:

A publicly available platform URL will be provided, demonstrating full Cardano mainnet integration with user authentication, project listings, AI assistant, documentation hub, and opportunities board functioning as intended.

Close-out video (5+ minutes) showcasing achievements:

A final video walkthrough summarizing the full project timeline, key features, user engagement, and future vision shared publicly to inspire further adoption and demonstrate accountability and transparency.

Final report with lessons learned and future roadmap:

A detailed project completion document will include insights from the build process, user feedback highlights, performance metrics, and a roadmap outlining recommended next steps, upgrades, and ecosystem collaborations.

sub_fields.answer:
Total Requested: ₳145,000

Detailed Breakdown

Development (₳70,000 - 48%)

Team Compensation (₳49,000 - 32%)

Project Lead (9 months, part-time): ₳26,000

Developers (2 x 9 months, part-time): ₳12,000

Designer (6 months, part-time): ₳15,000

Community Manager (9 months, part-time): ₳3,000

Infrastructure & Tools (₳10,000 - 7%)

Cloud hosting (AWS/GCP, 12 months): ₳4,000

AI API costs (OpenAI/Anthropic): ₳3,000

Development tools and licenses: ₳1,500

Domain, SSL, CDN: ₳500

Testing and QA tools: ₳1,000

Content & Documentation (₳7,000 - %)

Technical documentation and tutorials: ₳2,500

Video production (tutorials, demos): ₳2,000

Initial project curation and data entry: ₳1,500

Marketing & Community (₳6,000 - 4%)

Launch campaign and promotional materials: ₳2,000

Community events and workshops: ₳1,500

Social media and content marketing: ₳1,000

Conference attendance (Cardano Summit): ₳500

Legal & Administrative (₳3,000 - 2%)

Accounting and financial reporting: ₳500

Miscellaneous administrative costs: ₳500

Contingency (₳3,000 - 2%)

Buffer for unexpected challenges or opportunities

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
Why This Represents Excellent Value

Cost Efficiency:

Team rates: All team members are Cardano community members working at below-market rates due to passion for the ecosystem

Average developer rate: ₳2,200/month (vs. ₳5,000+ market rate)

We're leveraging existing open-source tools to minimize development costs

Comparable Projects:

Similar discovery platforms in other ecosystems cost $200K-$500K to build

We're achieving this at 60% lower cost through:

Lean, experienced team

Community partnerships reducing data curation costs

Multiplier Effect:

Direct impact:  users discovering and using Cardano tools

Indirect impact: Each discovered project gains visibility, driving more usage

Ecosystem savings: Developers save hours each in tool discovery =  hours saved collectively

Collaboration value: team connections = new projects and innovations

Long-term Sustainability:

Platform will continue operating beyond funding period

Potential for self-sustainability through premium features (not required for core functionality)

ROI for Cardano:

₳145K investment →  projects amplified → thousands of new users → increased on-chain activity

Budget Justification

Development costs (48%): Largest expense but essential for quality product

Building AI recommendation engine requires specialized expertise

Integration with multiple Cardano APIs and GitHub requires significant development time

User interface must be intuitive for mass adoption

Team compensation (25%): Below market rates, reflects commitment to Cardano

All team members taking reduced compensation to support ecosystem

Rates aligned with Cardano community standards

Infrastructure: Necessary for reliable, scalable platform

AI API costs unavoidable for conversational interface

Cloud hosting ensures 99%+ uptime for global users

Content & Marketing : Critical for adoption and community engagement

Quality documentation determines developer success with integrations

Marketing ensures platform reaches target audience

sub_fields.title: I confirm that evidence of prior research, whitepaper, design, or proof-of-concept is provided.
sub_fields.description: Foundational Work:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal includes ecosystem research and uses the findings to either (a) justify its uniqueness over existing solutions or (b) demonstrate the value of its novel approach.
sub_fields.description: Ecosystem Value Proposition:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal demonstrates technical capability via verifiable in-house talent or a confirmed development partner (GitHub, LinkedIn, portfolio, etc.)
sub_fields.description: Builder Credentials:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposer and all team members are in good standing with prior Catalyst projects.
sub_fields.description: Catalyst Standing:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal clearly defines the problem and the value of the on-chain utility.
sub_fields.description: Problem & Use Case:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the primary goal of the proposal is a working prototype deployed on at least a Cardano testnet.
sub_fields.description: Tangible Prototype:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal outlines a credible and clear technical plan and architecture.
sub_fields.description: Technical Approach:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the budget and timeline (≤ 12 months) are realistic for the proposed work.
sub_fields.description: Realistic Scope:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal includes a community engagement and feedback plan to amplify prototype adoption with the Cardano ecosystem.
sub_fields.description: Community Engagement:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the budget is for future development only; excludes retroactive funding, incentives, giveaways, re-granting, or sub-treasuries.
sub_fields.description: Budget Compliance:

sub_fields.title: I Agree
sub_fields.description: I confirm that I have read, understand and shall adhere to the [Project Catalyst Platform Terms of Use](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-terms-of-use), [Project Catalyst Platform Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-privacy-policy), [Terms & Conditions](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions), [Fund Rules](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/fund-rules), [Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/catalyst-fc-privacy-policy). I understand that providing accurate and truthful information is essential for my proposal to remain eligible to participate in the current Fund.
